mapper.insert: insert into num_info (guid,num,type,cardno,cname,orgid,allnum,childs,childname,idcard,name,ordertype,areatype,num2,foreigns) select #{guid} ,max(num)+1 ,#{type} ,#{cardno} ,#{cname} ,#{orgid} , CONCAT(d.prefix,IF(n.num<99,LPAD(max(num)+1, 3, 0),max(num)+1) ), #{childs},#{childname},#{idcard},#{name},#{ordertype},#{areatype}, (SELECT MAX(num) + 1 FROM num_info WHERE type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid}), #{foreigns} from num_info n left join dic d on n.type=d.guid where type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid} limit 1

insert into num_info (guid,num,type,cardno,cname,orgid,allnum,childs,childname,idcard,name,ordertype,areatype,num2,foreigns) select #{guid} ,max(num)+1 ,#{type} ,#{cardno} ,#{cname} ,#{orgid} , CONCAT(d.prefix,IF(n.num<99,LPAD(max(num)+1, 3, 0),max(num)+1) ), #{childs},#{childname},#{idcard},#{name},#{ordertype},#{areatype}, (SELECT MAX(num) + 1 FROM num_info WHERE type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid}), #{foreigns} from num_info n left join dic_code d on n.type=d.guid where type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid} limit 1

insert into num_info (guid,num,type,cardno,cname,orgid,allnum,childs,childname,idcard,name,ordertype,areatype,num2) select #{guid} ,MAX(num) + 1 ,#{type} ,#{cardno} ,#{cname} ,#{orgid} , CONCAT('Y', d.prefix,IF(n.num<99,LPAD(max(num)+1, 3, 0),max(num)+1) ), #{childs},#{childname},#{idcard},#{name},#{ordertype},#{areatype}, (SELECT MAX(num) + 1 FROM num_info WHERE type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid}) from num_info n left join dic d on n.type=d.guid where type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid} AND n.allnum LIKE 'Y%' limit 1

insert into num_info (guid,num,type,cardno,cname,orgid,allnum,childs,childname,idcard,name,ordertype,areatype,num2) select #{guid} ,MAX(num) + 1 ,#{type} ,#{cardno} ,#{cname} ,#{orgid} , CONCAT('Y',d.prefix,IF(n.num<99,LPAD(max(num)+1, 3, 0),max(num)+1) ), #{childs},#{childname},#{idcard},#{name},#{ordertype},#{areatype}, (SELECT MAX(num) + 1 FROM num_info WHERE type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid}) from num_info n left join dic_code d on n.type=d.guid where type=#{type} and n.orgid=#{orgid} AND n.allnum LIKE 'Y%' limit 1
mapper.select: select name,type,firsttype from window where find_in_set (#{ntype},TYPE) and orgid=#{norgid} order by CAST(name AS SIGNED)

select g.guid,CONCAT(d.prefix,g.num) num ,g.type,g.addtime,g.isused from num_info g INNER JOIN dic d on g.type=d.guid where find_in_set (d.guid,#{type}) and g.orgid=#{orgid} and isused=0 order by g.num

select g.guid,g.allnum num,g.type,g.addtime,g.isused,cardno,'' typename,g.childs from num_info g inner join buss_record r on g.guid=r.pguid where find_in_set (g.type,#{type}) and g.orgid=#{orgid} and isused=0 and FIND_IN_SET(r.type ,#{firsttype}) order by g.num limit 1;

select g.guid,g.allnum num,g.type,g.addtime,g.isused,cardno,'' typename,g.childs,g.childname,g.ordertype,g.areatype,g.foreigns from num_info g inner join buss_record r on g.guid=r.pguid where find_in_set (g.type,#{type}) and g.orgid=#{orgid} and isused=0 and FIND_IN_SET(r.type ,#{firsttype}) order by g.addtime

select g.allnum num,g.childs from num_info g where find_in_set (g.type,#{type}) and g.orgid=#{orgid} and isused=0
order by g.num,g.addtime
mapper.insert: insert into evaluate (userid,score,num,winid,nguid,orgid,name) select #{userid},#{score},#{num},#{winid},n.guid,orgid,#{name} from num_info n where n.allnum=#{num} and orgid=#{orgid} limit 1

INSERT into sign_record (guid,userid,orgid) select UUID(),#{userid},#{orgid} from sign_record t where not EXISTS ( select guid from sign_record where userid= #{userid} and to_days(addtime) = to_days(now()) ) limit 1
insert into num_info_all select * from num_info t where not EXISTS (select guid from num_info_all where guid= t.guid)
mapper.select: select DISTINCT l.guid from lcdlist l left JOIN lcd_window lw on l.guid=lw.lcdguid left JOIN window w on lw.windowid=w.guid where w.guid=#{guid}

select DISTINCT l.guid from lcdlist l left JOIN lcd_window lw on l.guid=lw.lcdguid left JOIN window w on lw.windowid=w.guid where ( w.guid=#{guid} and l.model not in (1,3)) union all select guid from lcdlist where model in (1,3) and schoolid =( select max(w.orgid) from window w where ( w.guid=#{guid} ) )
